instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2879-B not power on
threads.message:
Hello Everybody

Magsafe light is green and when battery charging orange but after hit power button orange turn green two second later turn orange not fan spin or anything.

No liquid damage,no drop

When measure

PPBUS_G3H = 12.5V ( when hit power button its start to down until 2v, magsafe cable unplug&plug its turn 12.5V again)
PP3V3_S5 = 3.3V
PP09_S5= 0.9V

I think sort to ground any of S0 rails but didnt find

Where can i start to check?

threads.title: 820-2879-B not power on
threads.message:
Something is pulling down PPBUS. Hard to tell which rail it is. First check all coils for shorts to GND.
Also power on with KBD disconnected and using the pads on the board.

threads.title: 820-2879-B not power on
threads.message:
When checked coils PP5V_S3 line is shorted ground. I found damaged C6213 shorted ground after replacement solved problem

Thank you Duke
